lead_paragraph: An article in some editions on Dec. 6 about the World Cup downhill competition at Beaver Creek, Colo., misstated the hometown of Scott Macartney, an American skier who placed 21st. He is from the Seattle area, not Lake Placid, N.Y.
snippet: An article in some editions on Dec. 6 about the World Cup downhill competition at Beaver Creek, Colo., misstated the hometown of Scott Macartney, an American skier who placed 21st. He is from the Seattle area, not Lake Placid, N.Y.
